name: Zhang liming
bio_1: I'm aliased as Liming at work..
bio_2: I'm a learner, builder, and freedom seeker.
bio_4: I was born in the beautiful Jiangxi province..
bio_5: My first programming language I learned was Java.
bio_start_coding: I started learning to code in 2011 and have been hooked ever since.
bio_first_job: I landed my first job as a Java software engineer in 2015.
bio_passion: I have a passion for JS/TS, web dev, and eCommerce.
bio_blog_purpose: I started this blog to document and share my knowledge & experience.
lost_message: Hmm.. it seems that you're lost
return_message: But don't worry, you can find plenty of other things on my homepage.
